attributes.action: Save Boughton St Pauls Nursery & Infant School, Chester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want to formally propose that Boughton St Paul's School be returned to a 1/2 form entry primary school.  This is the only city centre school left in Chester.  The school OFSTED Report 2006 stated "it is the only school in the area which embodies the principles of 'every child matters' very well".
